data.eml:eml: The genus Platytenerus Miyatake, 1985 (Coleoptera: Cleridae: Neorthopleurinae), with description of a new species from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Murakami, Hiroyuki (2015): The genus Platytenerus Miyatake, 1985 (Coleoptera: Cleridae: Neorthopleurinae), with description of a new species from Japan. Zootaxa 3936 (4): 584-592, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.4.8
